summary: POKÉMON DETECTIVE PIKACHU IN THEATERS FRIDAY
title: POKÉMON DETECTIVE PIKACHU IN THEATERS FRIDAY
body:
The live-action Pokémon movie the world has been waiting for is almost here!

The highly anticipated film POKÉMON Detective Pikachu opens in theaters this Friday. As you’ve probably heard by now, the live-action movie stars Justice Smith, Kathryn Newton, and Ryan Reynolds as the voice of Detective Pikachu. You won’t want to miss the exciting adventure as Tim Goodman and Pikachu explore Ryme City and uncover the mysteries of this Pokémon-filled world!

Check your local listings for theaters and showtimes in your area.

Check your local listings for theaters and showtimes in your area.

summary: THE ART OF SUN & MOON—UNBROKEN BONDS
title: THE ART OF SUN & MOON—UNBROKEN BONDS
body:
Whenever a new Pokémon TCG expansion is released, we like to take some time to look through the new cards and admire their artwork. The latest expansion, Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds, contains plenty of fabulous depictions of some of our favorite Pokémon, and we wanted to share them with you. Check out these outstanding illustrations, and don’t forget to take a closer look at your collection as well. You might just discover a new favorite!

Check out the feature here

summary: Every Pokemon is *someone's* favorite Pokemon and honestly that's goddam beautiful.
title: Every Pokemon is *someone's* favorite Pokemon and honestly that's goddam beautiful.
body: No matter how unremarkble I, personally, find a Pokemon, there’s someone out there for which this Pokemon is the best fucking Pokemon in the world and they always get excited seeing fanart and merch of that Pokemon and remembering this fact just always makes me smile.

summary: POKEMON TCG: DREAM LEAGUE REVEALED FOR JAPAN
title: POKEMON TCG: DREAM LEAGUE REVEALED FOR JAPAN
body: A new Pokemon TCG set has been revealed for Japan. The set is called Dream League, and will be out on Aug. 2nd, 2019. This set features 49 cards and focuses on Solgaleo, Lunala, Reshiram, Zekrom, Lillie, Roxie, N and Red.

reblog.comment: A new Pokemon TCG set has been revealed for Japan. The set is called Dream League, and will be out on Aug. 2nd, 2019. This set features 49 cards and focuses on Solgaleo, Lunala, Reshiram, Zekrom, Lillie, Roxie, N and Red.

summary: A Kawaii Friends Give-a-Way
title: A Kawaii Friends Give-a-Way
body:
A Kawaii Friends Give-a-Way

Three cheers for our first ✨EXCLUSIVE Kawaii Friends Give-a-Way✨

We’re SO EXCITED to share this give-a-way collaboration between
Quirk Con x Art Pastel Kelsey x DC Kawaii Style

This kawaii way fun is in support of Art Pastel Kelsey‘s awesome J-Fashion campaign ~

About the Project: This project is to fund my Series of Pokemon themed Lolita fashion Enamel Pins. This project has been in the works…

blog.name: happyhunting700
blog.title: This is Pokemon Purgatory
blog.description: I'm just a naive and foolish trainer who is prepared to spend the next 1000+ years completing a living shiny Pokedex. Previous shiny: Ho-Oh. Posting might be infrequent because I can easily get overwhelmed by shiny hunting and need a break. That, and shinies are just hard to find.

summary: INTERVIEW: POKÉMON: DETECTIVE PIKACHU Director Rob Letterman on turning Ryan Reynolds into a Pokémon
title: INTERVIEW: POKÉMON: DETECTIVE PIKACHU Director Rob Letterman on turning Ryan Reynolds into a Pokémon
body:
INTERVIEW: POKÉMON: DETECTIVE PIKACHU Director Rob Letterman on turning Ryan Reynolds into a Pokémon

The idea of making a live-action Pokémon must have been on many minds for years, but it took the combination of Legendary Pictures working with director Rob Letterman (Goosebumps) and the Pokémon Company to make it happen. Based on the “Detective Pikachu” video game, the game’s high concept is taken one step further by having that title Pikachu voiced by the one and only Ryan Reynolds.

The story…

View On WordPress
